text: â€˜â€˜ (tirukur'anakiya) itu poyyaka avar karpanai ceytu kontate tavira, verillai. I(taik karpanai ceyva)til veru makkal avarukku utavi purikinranar'' enru nirakarippavarkal kurukinranar. Akave, (nirakarippavarkal ivvaru kuruvatan karanamaka) avarkal aniyayattaiyum poyyaiyume cumantu kontanar
